name: Charlene Todd
text: Excellent service and they have the best pizza I have ever eaten in my life . The crust is perfect, the pizza sauce is so good and everything they put on the pizza is fresh and the best I have ever had . I highly recommend Mountain Mikes Pizza im a customer for life.

name: Laurie Johnson
text: We had a HORRIBLE experience. We waited 2 and a half hours for take out when they told us 1 hour.  We cancelled our order and when the driver showed up I told him we had cancelled our order.  The next morning we wake up to this in the road right in front of our house.  HORRIBLE..SO DISAPPOINTING.

name: Brian Spragge
text: THE PIZZA IS SO GOOD Just ordered a pizza from here recently and the person that brought it to the door was absolutely amazing. Henry was very helpful and happy and help us in any way he could. We gave him a big tip hoping to help him out in any little way.

name: Bonnie A.
text:
Soooo happy that they are here in NEWMAN now!
Great decor in the shop and have never had bad service or a wrong order from them! Pizzas are more expensive now, but isn't everything!? â€¦More

name: Daniela Hart
text: To many fails. The wait is outrageous, gawd forbid any more people move here or youâ€™ll be waiting 2 hours or more. Orders arenâ€™t made right, pizza arrived completely ruined (like dropped). Then we call to give it one last try and after â€¦More

name: Gina Bass
text: Friendly staff. The pizza was good but the all you can eat salad bar was a 3 out of 10. Not worth the money.

name: Carl Sawyer
text: Had a awesome experience in here with my kid. The food comes rapidly and the service is just awesome. Prices are reasonable.

name: Galina Tetoff
text:
Great pizza
5.00 dollar lunch special. 3 slices of pizza with soda
Or 10 dollars all you can eat pizza with salad an soda

name: Montana Silva
text: Have had carry out and delivery several times since they have opened and Iâ€™ve been very happy each time. Pizza tastes great. Fresh flavors and good service.

name: Oscar Lainez
text: Good place decent beer on tap spacious and very friendly.

name: Molly Cherry
text: Very nice decor and layout. Friendly staff, great pizza. Lots of menu choices for all different tastes.

name: Adam B
text: This is NOT up to Mountain Mike's standards. Skimped on the amount of toppings, and super greasy. Someone from corporate needs to check this place out and bring them up to standards. But friendly staff and nice to have in Newman. Just need to get up to franchise standard.

name: Calvin Lambert
text: Tried this spot once with a friend and I am obsessed ever since. I loved the fantastic character and delicious food and beverages. I recommend this place.

name: Debbie Teixeira
text: Great pizza. Love that you can order online and pick up when ready. Friendly staff.

name: Alejandra Flores-Morales
text: Really nice environment, the staff is amazing and super nice. They care about you and the food taste really good!

name: Amy Heath
text: Friendly staff, great pizza and quick service.

name: Mike Spragge
text: Very clean and attractive interior, with there usual great pizza.

name: Emmanuel Vaca
text: The service was nice and the workers were really helpful.

name: aj garcia
text: Pizza here is absolutely the best in Newman! So glad they decided to set up shop in my City!! Pizza is always hot and delicious.

name: jerry townsend
text: The food was great, and so are their salads but when you pay $ 7 for a salad and they tell you, you can't go back for another serving if you want. I bought three pizzas for our crown I don't care for pizza that's why I get a salad and a nice big salad is my dinner, so other than this little problem I think Mountain Mike's is okay.

name: hortencia azevedo
text: First of all it was really cold in the sitting area. The pizza had to much sauce and could have been cooked longer. The dough was soggy. I am accustomed to gettimg a pizza that comes right out of the oven and being piping hot. This one not so much. Won't be back to this location. I recommend either Los Banos or Turlock mountain mikes.

name: William Freeman
text: New in Newman, nice, clean and comfortable. Good pizza.

name: life's litt
text: Good pizza. best place around

name: Kelly Selman
text: It was cold inside and the pizza

name: Alex Hammond
text: Amazing people and tasty food

name: Amanda Edwards
text: garlic bread with cheese and all of it was burnt there was no cheese on it and the service was really bad and they were really rude

name: Elissia Paxia
text: Called in put on hold and got hung up on a few times. Was very disappointed. Service horrible

name: Debra A Burris
text: Awesome pizza always!

name: Susan Andrade
text: GOOD FOOD

name: juan angulo
text: Pizza taste like frozen pizza you buy at walmart wings are not good either you would not think it is mountains mike pizza

name: Alma Guerrero
text: Amazing taste

name: Jeremy Stambaugh
text: Great pizza

name: Rosie Gonzalez
text: Horrible service

name: JANE RODRIGUEZ
text: Great
